description: This is an affordable training program that shows business owners how to create a very simple, yet powerfully effective Sales Scripts Tool for their organization using MS PowerPoint. The training includes detailed video tutorials, a ready-made Sales Scripts Tool Template that can be easily customized for your specific business model and comprehensive 'step-by-step' online training documentation with written instructions and accompanying flowcharts, diagrams and screenshots that guide you through the entire process.
title: How To Create A Sales Scripts Tool Using MS PowerPoint
